Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • Group

  • public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a group of tiles. It has a value to add towards the total sum of the game to work towards the goal.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Group(Tile tile)
      Constructor with only one tile.
      Group(Tile tile1, Tile tile2)
      Constructor with two tiles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(Tile tileToFind)
      Checks if a tile is contained in this group.
      int getSum()
      Returns the sum of the values for this group.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if a group is empty.
      void removeTile(Tile tileToRemove)
      Method to remove a tile from a group.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Group

        public Group(Tile tile)
        Constructor with only one tile. This will create a group with a single tile.
        Parameters:
        tile - The single tile to add to the group.

      • Group

        public Group(Tile tile1,
             Tile tile2)
        Constructor with two tiles. This will create a group with two tiles.
        Parameters:
        tile1 - The first tile to add to the group.
        tile2 - The second tile to add to the group.

    • Method Detail

      • removeTile

        public void removeTile(Tile tileToRemove)
        Method to remove a tile from a group.
        Parameters:
        tileToRemove - The tile to remove from the group

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Tile tileToFind)
        Checks if a tile is contained in this group.
        Parameters:
        tileToFind - The tile to find in the group.
        Returns:
        True if the tile is in this group or false if it is not.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if a group is empty. A group is empty when both its tiles are null.
        Returns:
        True if the group is empty or false if it is not.

      • getSum

        public int getSum()
        Returns the sum of the values for this group.
        Returns:
        The total sum of this group.
